name: SAMMY Labs
headline: Automate onboarding, support & training with AI that mimics your users
description: SAMMY is an Al that explores your app like a real user, mapping every possible click to generate content, onboard users and spot issues. It updates automatically with every product change, keeping everything running smoothly. It may feel like magic, but it’s just powerful technology at work.

founders.name: Joe Savidge, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-Palantir pod lead , previous founder and IBanker (for my sins)

Now working on augmenting everything post-sales with screen based agents

founders.name: Shav Vimalendiran, Founder
founders.description: Ex-algorithmic & Quantitative Crypto Hedge Fund. Took spin off Portfolio & Risk management platform from 0-1 as Lead Founding Engineer. Building SAMMY, Automating everything post-sales.

### What is SAMMY though, really?
### What is SAMMY though, really?
## The Future of PLG
> SAMMY is an Al that explores your app like a real user, mapping every possible click to generate content, onboard users and spot issues. It updates automatically with every product change, keeping everything running smoothly. It may feel like magic, but it’s just powerful technology at work.

## 3 Steps to Automation
> **Step 1: SAMMY Runs** Run SAMMY with no code & integrates with 2 lines of code.
> **Step 2: SAMMY Creates** You asses the content (user-walkthroughs, videos, documentation/guides and more).
> **Step 3: SAMMY Grows** As your product evolves, everything updates automagically (see what we did there).
#### Secure
SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant for total peace of mind. Data is encrypted at every stage, keeping your product and user info safe. 
Strict access controls ensure only authorized teams can view or edit results
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/G2UWc9fHVShZvr2GZVhFgfanJM.png)
#### Proven Results
Results speak louder than words. Deployed across 10+ industries, driving faster releases and fewer production issues. Backed by success stories from startups and enterprise clients alike.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yZIJBQjp2mJYXrkHsHkF4gbTdg.png)
#### Secure
SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant for total peace of mind. Data is encrypted at every stage, keeping your product and user info safe. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wbks0LAqWtJmTLVDdjUy0drQE8.png)
#### Proven Results
Results speak louder than words. Deployed across 10+ industries; 80% higher completion rates on user actions; 65% reduction in support burden and $Xm saved in early bug-catches. That's the SAMMY way.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yZIJBQjp2mJYXrkHsHkF4gbTdg.png)
#### Secure
SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant for total peace of mind. Data is encrypted at every stage, keeping your product and user info safe. 
Strict access controls ensure only authorized teams can view or edit results
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/G2UWc9fHVShZvr2GZVhFgfanJM.png)
#### Proven Results
Results speak louder than words. Deployed across 10+ industries, driving faster releases and fewer production issues. Backed by success stories from startups and enterprise clients alike.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yZIJBQjp2mJYXrkHsHkF4gbTdg.png)
#### All-in-One
Unified platform for testing, documentation, onboarding, and more. New modules released every month and on request. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cEBmsabpvoZcK8XTo7wWrV8WE.png)
### Connectivity
Whether you're using Zendesk, Intercom or even an in-house solution; Playwright, Selenium or hand-written scripts; whatever you use - connectivity is in our blood, we're here to help.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KA6iJDBWGdGOXEm8NfC6ABBpuk.png)
#### All-in-One
Unified platform for testing, documentation, onboarding, and more. New modules released every month and on request. 
No juggling multiple tools or licenses—one trusted AI model powers everything.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cEBmsabpvoZcK8XTo7wWrV8WE.png)
### Connectivity
Whether you're using Zendesk, Intercom or even an in-house solution; Playwright, Selenium or hand-written scripts; whatever you use - connectivity is in our blood, we're here to help.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KA6iJDBWGdGOXEm8NfC6ABBpuk.png)
#### All-in-One
Explain how you use data analytics to drive your strategies, showcasing your commitment to making informed decisions that lead to success.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cEBmsabpvoZcK8XTo7wWrV8WE.png)
### Global Reach
Highlight your ability to work with clients from around the world, showcasing your global presence and adaptability.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KA6iJDBWGdGOXEm8NfC6ABBpuk.png)
## Pricing
Calculator
SAMMY charges per automated action - like finding a bug or generating a piece of documentation - starting at **$0.30** each. 
Whether you're an enterprise or a new startup - you pay the same. 
No BS. That's the SAMMY way.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JlXjGuL6cCrTINQaoGF5slD6ynE.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JlXjGuL6cCrTINQaoGF5slD6ynE.png?scale-down-to=1024)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: SAMMY Labs**

Founded in 2024 and located in San Francisco, SAMMY Labs is a cutting-edge software company that leverages artificial intelligence to automate user onboarding, support, and training. A part of Y Combinator's Batch W25, this startup operates with a lean team of just three employees. Their mission is clear: to enhance user experiences by mimicking real user interactions within applications.

**The Technology Behind SAMMY**

At the heart of SAMMY is an AI engine that behaves like a genuine user. It navigates through your app, mapping all possible interactions to create tailored content, help onboard users, and identify issues. The continuous learning aspect of the technology means that it updates automatically with every product change—making it feel almost magical in its operation.

**Key Features:**

- **User Experience Optimization:** SAMMY generates customized walkthroughs, documentation, and onboarding experiences that evolve alongside the application’s improvements.
- **Automation Process:** The service operates in three steps—run SAMMY with minimal code, assess the generated content, and watch as your onboarding and documentation automatically grow with your product.
- **Secured and Compliant:** The platform adheres to SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA standards, ensuring data protection and privacy for users.
- **Proven Success:** With impressive metrics such as an 80% increase in completion rates and a 65% reduction in support inquiries, SAMMY is deployed across numerous industries, showcasing its versatility.

**Business Model and Pricing**

SAMMY adheres to a straightforward pricing model, charging $0.30 per automated action—whether that's finding a bug or generating a piece of documentation. This transparent approach means that both startups and enterprises are treated equally.

**Connectivity and Integration**

Flexibility is key for SAMMY; it integrates seamlessly with existing customer support tools like Zendesk and Intercom, as well as automated testing frameworks such as Selenium. This adaptability ensures that customers don’t have to revamp their entire tech stack to get the benefits of SAMMY.

**Looking Ahead**

With its innovative approach and a mission that resonates in today’s fast-evolving digital landscape, SAMMY Labs is not just about enhancing customer experience; it’s about redefining how companies interact with their users from the very beginning. For more information, visit their website at [sammylabs.com](https://www.sammylabs.com).
